video.title: Forensic Files
video.synopsis: Detectives and crime lab technicians use the latest and most fascinating procedures to solve crimes in this documentary-style show.

episodes.synopsis: When foul play befalls her father, a woman travels a thousand miles to find out what happened and who was behind it.
episodes.title: If I Were You

episodes.synopsis: When police try to figure out how a stalker acquired information about his victim, they find clues in a series of letters he sent to terrorize her.
episodes.title: A Tight Leash

episodes.synopsis: When an insurance assessor disappears while inspecting a storm-ravaged house, the police find evidence of a sloppy killer who left plenty of clues.
episodes.title: Muffled Cries

episodes.synopsis: When a woman vanishes hours after winning big at a casino and then turns up dead a month later, an anonymous phone call gives police their first lead.
episodes.title: Skirting the Evidence

episodes.synopsis: When a string of bombings terrorizes a small Colorado town, police examine the remnants of the bombs to track the culprit.
episodes.title: Small Town Terror

episodes.synopsis: New forensic technology -- including DNA profiling -- enables authorities to reopen the investigation into a 20-year-old murder case.
episodes.title: Fresh Heir

episodes.synopsis: Evidence and witness testimony conflict when a fall down a flight of stairs kills a socialite, leaving the final determination up to forensic experts.
episodes.title: Step by Step

episodes.synopsis: Carpet and blanket fibers, coupled with unique wax bullets, help forensic experts track down the man who killed a department-store clerk.
episodes.title: Blanket of Evidence

episodes.synopsis: When a woman's body is found in a burned-out house, microscopic clues on a piece of pipe help determine whether her death was an accident or murder.
episodes.title: Fired-Up

episodes.synopsis: Three years after the murders of a millionaire and his family, new clues -- including a decades-old box of ammunition -- point to the killer.
episodes.title: Two in a Million

episodes.synopsis: This episode re-examines the 1960 kidnapping and murder of brewery heir Adolph Coors III through the lens of modern forensic techniques.
episodes.title: Bitter Brew

episodes.synopsis: When the prime suspect in a young girl's murder is sent to prison, high-tech tools from NASA help prove that the wrong man is serving time.
episodes.title: Sharper Image

episodes.synopsis: Investigators track the clues left behind by a missing woman, including surveillance footage of what may have been her last hours on earth.
episodes.title: Wheel of Misfortune

episodes.synopsis: More than 10 years after the slaying of a Seattle musician, DNA evidence collected at the time of the crime becomes vital to solving the case.
episodes.title: The Day the Music Died

episodes.synopsis: When a graduate student disappears and is presumed dead, a geology professor at Michigan State University lends his special expertise to the case.
episodes.title: Sole Survivor

episodes.synopsis: A spurned would-be lover may be behind the death of a woman gunned down in her driveway, but it won't be easy to prove the young man was obsessed.
episodes.title: Catch 22

episodes.synopsis: When a woman is raped and murdered on the beach, investigators track down the killer through a pair of shoes left near the body.
episodes.title: A Cinderella Story

episodes.synopsis: Eight years after the rape and murder of a college student, a cell phone and some running shoes help investigators crack the cold case.
episodes.title: Sands of Crime

episodes.synopsis: Investigators believe that a missing college student will turn up -- until they find blood evidence that her boyfriend has tried to cover up.
episodes.title: Sworded Scheme

episodes.synopsis: A unique button and some of its connecting threads are investigators' only clues when a woman is stabbed more than 30 times.
episodes.title: Fashion Police

episodes.synopsis: When a woman disappears after evening church services, police search for a mysterious van that several witnesses saw her step into.
episodes.title: Church Dis-service

episodes.synopsis: Weeks after a young girl vanishes, a psychic leads investigators to a field, where they find her body and clues to her killer's identity.
episodes.title: Seedy Intentions

episodes.synopsis: When forensic specialists enhance surveillance footage, they discover that a seemingly simple encounter is instead an abduction by a serial killer.
episodes.title: DNA Dragnet

episodes.synopsis: When a surgeon is stabbed to death, the prime suspect has an alibi -- until the investigation uncovers a conspiracy behind the murder.
episodes.title: Office Visit

episodes.synopsis: At an apartment where a mother was stabbed to death, investigators find plenty of evidence but have no suspect to compare it against.
episodes.title: Shoe-in for Murder

episodes.synopsis: A family of four is gunned down in what appears to be an interrupted robbery, but police discover a far more heinous motive behind the attack.
episodes.title: Family Interrupted

episodes.synopsis: When a woman with more than 50 stab wounds is found floating in a harbor, are her missing ex and daughter also victims, or did they commit the murder?
episodes.title: Runaway Love

episodes.synopsis: When the prime suspect in a park ranger's murder is quickly cleared, nearly six years elapse before DNA technology brings new facts to light.
episodes.title: Watchful Eye

episodes.synopsis: Authorities don't have much to go on when a rapist and murderer spends hours cleaning up the crime scene and then disposes of the body.
episodes.title: Waste Mis-Management

episodes.synopsis: A week after a couple vanishes during a Memorial Day beach trip, a seemingly unrelated robbery leads authorities to new clues.
episodes.title: Dirty Little Seacret

episodes.synopsis: After a young mother is killed and her 4-year-old daughter brutally assaulted, it takes 15 years until DNA technology can identify the culprit.
episodes.title: Lights Out

episodes.synopsis: A woman's rapist and murderer is brought to justice with evidence from an unlikely source: a hamburger bun.
episodes.title: Purebread Murder

episodes.synopsis: When numerous clues bring investigators to a murder scene, evidence is plentiful -- but the victim's body is nowhere to be found.
episodes.title: Hear No Evil

episodes.synopsis: When a woman is shot to death in a church parking lot, police zero in on her spouse, who recently learned she'd been having an affair for three years.
episodes.title: Three's a Crowd

episodes.synopsis: When a man dies after a hydraulic jack slips and drops a truck on him, investigators soon discover that it wasn't just a tragic accident.
episodes.title: A Squire's Riches

episodes.synopsis: When a woman is beaten to death a month after her husband saves her from a fire, evidence points to an intruder -- but authorities have their doubts.
episodes.title: Home of the Brave

episodes.synopsis: When a woman is slain, police suspect her philandering fiancé until a third party steps forward with a surprising revelation about the murder weapon.
episodes.title: Textbook Murder

episodes.synopsis: A missing teenage girl's family hopes that she just ran away, but the discovery of her body confirms their worst fears and sends police on a manhunt.
episodes.title: Filtered Out

episodes.synopsis: The bodies of a woman and her two daughters are found floating in Tampa Bay, leading to a high-profile manhunt.
episodes.title: Water Logged

episodes.synopsis: When four young people are slaughtered in an upscale Texas community, neighbors give authorities descriptions of two strangers seen in the area.
episodes.title: Social Circle
